preparation module¶

class preparation.prepare(args)[source]¶

Bases: object

A base class to initialise and prepare AIMS calculations.

adjust_control()[source]¶

This function processes the control.in file to add comments that are currently not implemented in the ASE.

adjust_cost()[source]¶
adjust_scf(line)[source]¶
adjust_task(line)[source]¶
adjust_xc(line)[source]¶
setup_bandpath()[source]¶

This function sets up the band path according to AFLOW conventions in the AIMS-specific format.

setup_calculator()[source]¶

This function sets up the calculator object of the ASE. Because certain functions are not implemented yet, it simply writes out the input files.

write_submit_t3000()[source]¶

Writes the .sh file to submit on the t3000 via qsub.

write_submit_taurus()[source]¶

Writes the .sh file to submit on the taurus via sbatch.
